column2: What was your age last birthday?
Has a family member suffered or suffers from being overweight?
Do you eat high caloric food frequently?
Do you usually eat vegetables in your meals?
How many main meals do you have daily?
Do you eat any food between meals?
How much water do you drink daily?
Do you monitor the calories you eat daily?
How many days per week are you physically active?
How much time do you use technological devices such as cell phone, videogames, television, computer and others?
How often do you drink alcohol?
Which transportation do you usually use?
